cause.description:
The Childrens Miracle Network is an organization to help children find their MIRACLE.......as Miss Gaston County's Outstanding Teen and being apart of the Miss America Organazation this is our national platform! I want to make a diifference in a child life and Im sure you do too! The Childrens Miracle Network raises money to support and pay for children who have rare, common or basically any diseases such as CANCER.......CYSTIC FIBROSIS and much more! Help a child find their MIRACLE and I can promise you may find yours along the way!
1. Help a child have a MIRACLE!
cause.mission: Help a Child get their MIRACLE
cause.name: MIRACLES
